title: Airtable Surveys
description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Airtable source for Surveys

question_category_mapping.title: Question Category Mapping
question_category_mapping.description: JSON map from survey question categories to Faros question categories.

survey_started_at.title: Survey Started At
survey_started_at.description: The timestamp when the survey was started.

survey_ended_at.title: Survey Ended At
survey_ended_at.description: The timestamp when the survey was ended.

question_column_index_start.title: Question Columns Start Index
question_column_index_start.description: The index of the first question column header.

id_column_name.title: Survey ID Column Name
id_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey ID.

survey_name_column_name.title: Survey Name Column Name
survey_name_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey name.

survey_type_column_name.title: Survey Type Column Name
survey_type_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the survey type.

name_column_name.title: Name Column Name
name_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the respondent name.

email_column_name.title: Email Column Name
email_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the respondent email.

team_column_name.title: Team Column Name
team_column_name.description: The name of the column that contains the respondent team name.
